message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,400,000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you considering my interest. While I see the value in this product, I'm only able to offer $1,300,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that you're willing to pay $1,300,000, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1,350,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering its worth to you.
